articles.title: Spectacular drone footage captures thousands of turtles nesting

articles.title: The illegal industry booming under South Africa's lockdown
articles.description: In South Africa, a coronavirus ban on cigarettes and alcohol has sparked an illegal business. CNN's David McKenzie speaks with soldiers trying to enforce the ban and with a Zimbabwean cigarette smuggler, who says his "profits are up."

articles.title: A multiracial family accused of being Antifa protesters was trapped on a road near their campsite, police say
articles.description: A family of four found themselves stranded near a Washington state campsite shortly after they were confronted by a group of people asking if they were Antifa protesters, local police say.

articles.author: Scottie Andrew, CNN
articles.title: This city disbanded its police department 7 years ago. Here's what happened next
articles.description: Camden, New Jersey, dissolved its police department and replaced it after corruption rendered the existing agency unfixable. Now, seven years later, the city's crime has dropped by close to half.
